column2: 12. On 12-06-2017, the Petitioner has filed this present Application seeking, inter alia, the
For a writ in the nature of a writ of Mandamus directing the Respondents to make
order  that  the  land  depicted  in  Plan  No.  14426  dated  20-09-2016  annexed  to  the
petition  as  P2(a)  is  not  a  paddy  land  as  defined  in  section  101  of  the  Agrarian
Development Act No. 46 of 2000 [as stated in prayer (d) of the Petition].
For a writ in the nature of a writ of Certiorari quashing the letter dated 27-08-2015
annexed to the petition as P4(c) [as stated in prayer (e) of the Petition].
